attributes.review: The Annoying orange attacked my phone with viruses, I keep getting spammed with orange juice ads on every website. My phone doesn’t work properly anymore it’s infected and damaged!! My emoji keyboard is empty and only has the orange emoji 🍊🍊🍊Help!!
attributes.title: Awful App

attributes.review: Why support a racist, sexist, and most disgraceful man! I ask, when was America ever great? This country had its ups but throughout history it was never great! So how can someone say “Make America great again” if it was never great!
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD🤢🤮

attributes.review: This app tried to slip something in my drink at a party before cussing me out for not going home with him then threw up on his own Sperrys and vineyard vines tshirt that his daddy bought for him 🤢 not worth a second of your life
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: Out of all the amazing apps out here this one is just not good. Not only did it give my phone a virus but it kept telling me to attend it’s bunker!!! Terrible job I’m telling you!
attributes.title: Terrible just terrible

attributes.review: This app is pure trash! You would think our amazing leader could afford to fund a better app.. It is so glitchy & overall unusable! May as well delete the app. This was a huge letdown😔.
attributes.title: Bad

attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch, called my mom ugly and fat, then proceeded to tell me that I had no rights as a lesbian, hispanic woman. It broke into my house and took our microwave, now I can’t make hot pockets. By far THE WORST app I have ever downloaded.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP!!!

attributes.review: This app will start a satanic ritual the moment you open it. It will call upon all the demons and spirits in your area and you already know it’s gonna be The Conjuring 4. If corona doesn’t get you, the spirits will.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: this app is the worst! it gave my phone a virus and i had to get a new phone because it wouldn’t allow me to open any apps on my phone! pls don’t get this app!
attributes.title: Ugh

attributes.review: It keeps glitching. Every time I open it it shows me completely biased information. 1 Star. If I wanted this fake news I would have watched fox.
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: This app is the worst it’s content is full of lies and incomplete information I don’t even know how to describe how much I hate this app. This app also has content that is unrelated I saw a orange pig 🐷 for the first time and it was SCARRRY 😵
attributes.title: Worst app ever
